patthana8.9:4.1: Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.9:4.2: Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.9:4.3: Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.9:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
